img_summary: The image depicts the "Skandha of Thought," an epic key item from the game Black Myth: Wukong. It is described as a treasure once hidden inside the Buddha's head, holding a secret yet to be revealed. The item is found in the Valley of Ecstasy, specifically at Mindfulness Cliff in The New West. Players must follow a path from the Shrine, drop down when they see wooden boards connecting two cliffs, and continue until they reach a Buddha statue to obtain the item. The Skandha of Thought is used alongside other Skandha key items to create the Skandhas Pill from Xu Dog in Yellow Wind Ridge.
